directions: Answer each question regarding comparisons between different types of electromagnetic wave.

questions.text: As wavelength of an electromagnetic wave becomes shorter, explain what happens to the frequency of the wave:

answerChoices.text: Frequency becomes higher.
Frequency becomes lower.
Frequency does not change.

questions.text: As wavelength of an electromagnetic wave becomes longer, explain what happens to the frequency of the wave:

answerChoices.text: Frequency becomes higher.
Frequency becomes lower.
Frequency does not change.

questions.text: Compare green light and yellow light

answerChoices.text: Green light has a higher frequency, and yellow light has a longer wavelength
Green light has a lower frequency, and yellow light has a shorter wavelength
Green light has a higher frequency, and yellow light has a higher speed.
Green light has a longer wavelength, and yellow light has a higher frequency.

questions.text: Compare infrared waves and radio waves

answerChoices.text: Infrared waves have a higher frequency, and radio waves have a longer wavelength.
Infrared waves have a lower frequency, and radio waves have a shorter wavelength
Infrared waves have a lower frequency, and radio wave have a longer wavelength
Infrared waves and radio waves have the same wavelength.
Gamma rays have a shorter wavelength, and X-Rays have a lower frequency.
Gamma rays have a longer wavelength, and X-Rays have a higher frequency
Gamma rays have a higher speed, and X-Rays have a lower frequency.
Gamma rays have a lower speed, and X-Rays have a longer wavelength.
